page.shortlink: tabbed ui properties session timeout warning advance warning timing property
page.description: Defines when a reminder that the session will expire should be shown to the user.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Advance warning timing]* property defines when a warning message should be shown to the user informing them that the session will expire. The time is specified in minutes. For example, to display a warning 5 minutes before the user's session times out, you would enter *[ui:5]* for the *[ui:Advance warning timing]* setting.
When the warning message is shown, the user can click a button to extend the session.
